item.title: About Me
item.description: I live in Newcastle-under-Lyme, Staffordshire with my wife Rachael and our son Harrison. I grew up in nearby Burslem - the ‘Mother Town’ of the Potteries. I’m a season ticket holder at Port Vale FC and also support Yorkshire CCC and Minnesota Vikings. Alongside an ever-growing record collection, Radio 6 Music forms the soundtrack to my life. I’m a real bookworm and you’ll often find me with a vintage Penguin and a cup of tea.
